H0.text: At the time the Spice Girls became famous, what was Scary Spice’s surname. Adams

H3.text: At the time the Spice Girls became famous, what was Scary Spice’s surname. Brown

A4.text: Melanie Janine Brown McPhee, MBE (born 29 May 1975), commonly known as Mel B or Melanie B, is an English singer, songwriter, dancer, television personality, and actress.
